Hello! I’m Aria, and this is my personal blog.😎
My Background Sept 2023 ‑ Expected May 2025
M.S. in Software Design and Development丨University of Galway
Jan 2018 ‑ Nov 2022
English Teacher丨The New Oriental Education Technology Group Co., Ltd.
Sep 2013 ‑ Jun 2017
B.A. in French Language and Literature丨Zhejiang University
My Interests ✈️Traveling (Travelled to 29 of China’s 34 provinces and 12 countries including China!)
📸Photography (Canon EOS 760D & Nikon)
🎮Video games (Switch & Steam)
Thank you for visiting my blog. I hope you find the content here interesting and useful!😊
